thread.title: Brooklyn Bridge Bicyclist Warns Pedestrians to Clear the Bike Lane by Singing a Star Wars-Inspired Song
thread.title_full: Brooklyn Bridge Bicyclist Warns Pedestrians to Clear the Bike Lane by Singing a Star Wars-Inspired Song

author: Lori Dorn
title: Brooklyn Bridge Bicyclist Warns Pedestrians to Clear the Bike Lane by Singing a Star Wars-Inspired Song
text:
On New Year’s Day, a genial but determined bicyclist attempted to clear pedestrians from the bike land on the Brooklyn Bridge. Rather than pushing his way through, however, he offered the foot traffic plenty of warning with his beautiful voice singing “You’re in the Bike Lane” to the tune of the iconic Star Wars tune “ The Imperial March “.
via reddit
